title: Scroll Info API - Props - Context
content:
<PropName
  name="x"
  type=""
  isContextProp
/>
Current scroll position along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="y"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Current scroll position along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="xDifference"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Last number of pixels scrolled along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="yDifference"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Last number of pixels scrolled along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="xPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage scrolled along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="yPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage scrolled along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="totalPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage scrolled along the both and x and y-axes
<PropName
  name="eventsFired"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Number of animation frames completed
